TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ButtonBase extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public MustInherit Class ButtonBase Inherits Control
public ref class ButtonBase abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 實作按鈕控制項通用的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會從繼承。You do not typically inherit from . 若要建立您自己按鈕的類別，繼承自， ，或類別。To create your own button class, inherit from the , , or class. 若要顯示影像的衍生的按鈕控制項，請設定屬性或和屬性。To have the derived button control display an image, set the property or the and properties. 映像可以藉由設定對齊按鈕控制項上屬性。The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the property. 同樣地，若要對齊顯示按鈕控制項上，設定屬性。Likewise, to align the displayed on the button control, set the property. 屬性決定的樣式和控制項的外觀。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果屬性設定為，使用者的作業系統決定控制項的外觀。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoEllipsis { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出省略字元 (...) 是否會顯示在控制項的右邊緣，表示控制項文字超過控制項的指定長度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

value.span: 如果要以省略符號表示還有其他標籤文字，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`來顯示文字超出控制項的寬度，當使用者通過的控制項的滑鼠時。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 您必須設定控制項的`AutoSize`屬性`false`如果您想是`true`。You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want to be `true`. 如果`AutoSize`是`true`控制項將會成長以容納文字，不會出現省略符號。If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ButtonBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#136)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#136)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性只能搭配控制其是。Use the property only with controls whose is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle FlatStyle { System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按鈕控制項的平面樣式外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性和類別設為`System`、 繪製控制項的使用者的作業系統和核取對齊根據`CheckAlign`和屬性值。When the property of the and classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and property values. `CheckAlign`不會變更屬性值，但控制項的外觀可能會受到影響。The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected. 核取方塊水平對齊的控制項 （左或置中對齊顯示左邊的對齊，以滑鼠右鍵會保持不變），向左或右邊緣和以垂直方式對齊的描述性文字相同。The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text. 例如，如果您有用來控制`CheckAlign`屬性值為`ContentAlignment`。For example, if you have a control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`. `MiddleCenter`屬性值為`ContentAlignment.TopRight`，而屬性值設定為`System`，核取方塊對齊方式將會出現`ContentAlignment.TopLeft`維持不變的文字對齊方式。`MiddleCenter`, a property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像屬性不會顯示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考就會包含命名空間。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Size GetPreferredSize(valuetype System.Drawing.Size proposedSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize
param.span: 控制項的自訂大小區域。

span.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

summary.span: 擷取可容納控制項之矩形區域的大小。

span.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

returns.span: 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行為不同的控制項。The behavior of differs by control. 可能無法傳回的大小指派給控制項。The might be unable to assign the returned size to the control. 您可以傳回的大小大於中指出的條件約束`proposedSize`參數，但`proposedSize`應該降低為條件約束則會減少。You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases. 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不能大於`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`. 例外狀況是`proposedSize`為 0 或`Size.Empty`，這會定義為非限制。The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ Image { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Image ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按鈕控制項上顯示的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則屬性將設定為`null`，而屬性會設定為其預設值為-1。When the property is set, the property will be set to `null`, and the property will be set to its default, -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像屬性不會顯示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考就會包含命名空間。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ImageIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按鈕控制項所顯示影像的影像清單索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

value.span: 以零起始的索引，表示 中的影像位置。

span.span: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an .
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當或設定的屬性，屬性設為預設值， `null`。When the or properties are set, the property is set to its default value, `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性值變更為`null`、屬性會傳回其預設值為-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 不過，受指派值是保留在內部，使用時，另一個物件指派給屬性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果新指派給屬性具有屬性值小於或等於指派給的值，減去 1 （以帳戶為集合的以零為起始的索引） 的屬性屬性值會調整為其中一個小於屬性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，請考慮按鈕控制項有三個映像和其屬性設為 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果新只有兩個映像具有指派給按鈕值變更為 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，並設定和屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此程式碼需要已經建立而且至少有一個已指派給它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此程式碼也需要您具有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 所指派的值小於 的下限。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當或設定屬性，則屬性設定`null`，這是預設值。When the or property is set, the property is set `null`, which is its default value. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性值變更為`null`、屬性會傳回其預設值為-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 不過，受指派值是保留在內部，使用時，另一個指派給屬性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another is assigned to the property. 如果新指派給屬性具有屬性值小於或等於指派給的值，減一的屬性 （因為集合是以零為起始的索引），則屬性值會調整為其中一個小於屬性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，請考慮按鈕控制項有三個映像和其屬性設為 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果新只有兩個映像具有指派給按鈕值變更為 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，並設定和屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此程式碼需要已經建立而且至少有一個已指派給它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此程式碼也需要您具有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. span.span: if the button control is the default button; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，按鈕是預設按鈕。When the property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the . 這表示如果沒有其他按鈕已按下 ENTER 鍵或 ENTER 鍵可擷取的其他任何控制項有焦點時按下按鈕。This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus. 若要指定表單的預設按鈕，設定表單屬性以所需的按鈕。To specify the default button of a form, set the property of the form to the desired button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫按鈕已停用 (這包括基底類別的呼叫方法，當您覆寫衍生類別中)。Do not call if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's method when you override in a derived class). 停用的覆寫中的按鈕時，呼叫基底類別的方法，然後再停用 按鈕，或沒有完全呼叫它。When disabling the button in an override of , call the base class's method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考就會包含命名空間。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定要使用 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 還是 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫具有參數的方法`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMnemonic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將前面加上連字號 (&) 的第一個字元當做控制項的助憶鍵來使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control.

value.span: 如果第一個字元前面加上連字號 (&) 是用做為控制項的助憶鍵的索引鍵，否則。

span.span: if the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseVisualStyleBackColor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

value.span: 如果背景是使用視覺化樣式所繪製，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化樣式，則控制項的外觀的規格。Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls. 例如，視覺化樣式可以定義色彩、 大小和控制項的字型，而且可以讓您設定視覺化介面，以便與您的應用程式介面協調。For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface. 此外，它們會提供所有的 Windows 架構應用程式，將套用的視覺化樣式的機制。Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.
